unnormalised: Mumbai: In a rapidly evolving market, accurate inventory forecasting is no longer a luxury but a necessity for Indian manufacturers and supply chain managers. Experts at IIT-Delhi highlighted at a recent seminar on 23/07/2024 that inefficient inventory management can lead to lost sales (a major setback during Diwali season) and increased storage costs, impacting profit margins significantly.
